author: purplecabbage
msg: Errors were not being handled properly. lastPosition was null but this was still considered a success state.
If your application is useless without GeoLocation, then you can let iPhone show the prompt with the button to jump straight to Settings->General->Location Services. This will however exit your app.
Added some comments on describing what the position options mean.

author: wildabeast
msg: successCallback was not being called; also added downloadCompleteCallback for remote urls

author: remy@remysharp.com
msg: Fix to passing options to the custom url scheme - the handleOpenURL would fire too late, so the url info would be blank and cause the app to crash. This fixes this and passes the Invoked_param in correctly.
